original: Hañci atthi aniyato rāsi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci atthi aniyataḥ rāsi no ca vata re vattabbe
rāsi sammatta niyataḥ rāsi aniyataḥ rāsi iti

original: “micchattaniyato rāsi, sammattaniyato rāsi, aniyato rāsi”, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: rāsi sammatta niyataḥ rāsi aniyataḥ rāsi no ca vata re vattabbe
diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam kammam diṭṭhadhamma vedanīya ṭṭhena niyatanti
apara apariya vedanīyam kammaṃ apara apariya vedanīya ṭṭhena niyatanti

original: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṁ kammaṁ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṭṭhena niyataṁ, upapajjavedanīyaṁ kammaṁ …pe…
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam kammam diṭṭhadhamma vedanīya aṭṭhena niyate upapajja vedanīyam kammam pe
apara apariya vedanīyam kammaṃ apara apariya vedanīya ṭṭhena niyatanti

original: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṁ kammaṁ upapajjavedanīyaṁ hoti, aparāpariyavedanīyaṁ hoti …pe…
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam kammam upapajja vedanīyam hoti apara apariya vedanīyam hoti pe

original: upapajjavedanīyaṁ kammaṁ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṁ hoti, aparāpariyavedanīyaṁ hoti …pe…
analyzed: upapajja vedanīyam kammam diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam hoti apara apariya vedanīyam hoti pe

original: aparāpariyavedanīyaṁ kammaṁ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṁ hoti, upapajjavedanīyaṁ hotīti?
analyzed: apara apariya vedanīyam kammam diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam hoti upapajja vedanīyam hoti iti

original: Tena hi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṁ kammaṁ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṭṭhena niyataṁ, upapajjavedanīyaṁ kammaṁ …pe…
analyzed: tena hi diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam kammam diṭṭhadhamma vedanīya ṭṭhena niyate upapajja vedanīyam kammam pe
apara apariya vedanīyam kammaṃ apara apariya vedanīya ṭṭhena niyatanti

original: Sāsanaṁ navaṁ kataṁ atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanaṁ navaṁ karoti labbhā tathāgatassa
analyzed: sāsanam navam katam atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanam navam karoti labbhā tathāgatassa

original: sāsanaṁ puna navaṁ kātuṁ, puthujjano tedhātukehi kammehi avivitto, atthi kiñci saṁyojanaṁ
analyzed: sāsanam puna navam kātu puthujjanaḥ tedhātukehi kammehi a vivittaḥ atthi kiñci sayojana

original: appahāya arahattappatti, atthi adhippāyiddhi buddhānaṁ vā sāvakānaṁ vā, atthi buddhānaṁ
analyzed: a pahāya arahatta ppatti atthi buddhānam vā sāvakānam vā atthi

original: buddhehi hīnātirekatā, sabbā disā buddhā tiṭṭhanti, sabbe dhammā niyatā, sabbe kammā niyatāti.
analyzed: buddhehi hīna atireka tā sabbāḥ disāḥ buddhāḥ tiṭṭhanti sabbe dhammāḥ niyatā sabbe kammāḥ niyatā ati
